resources.string: Let us always meet each other with a smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
There is no remedy for love but to love more.
Let all that you do be done in love.
And above all these put on love, which binds everything together in perfect harmony.
And now these three remain faith, hope, and love. But the greatest of these is love.
Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
Being loved is life\'s second greatest blessing; loving is the greatest.
Since love grows within you, so beauty grows. For love is the beauty of the soul.
The best use of life is love. The best expression of love is time. The best time to love is now.
How do you spell \'love\'? – Piglet \"You don\'t spell it, you feel it.\"
Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
Be devoted to one another in love. Honor one another above yourselves.
There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear
Love is putting someone else’s needs before yours.
